settings.title: Sales and Logistics Administrator
settings.job_description:
We are seeking a Sales and Logistics Administrator to support our team to help us grow our online shop and further our business footprint around the world.

Job Responsibilities


1. Calculating shipping costs
2. Updating weekly shipment/payment status
3. Dealing with shipment and Coordinating with forwarders
4. Creating quotations
5. Processing orders in ERP
6. Informing customers of dispatch timeline and dealing with shipping delays
7. Oversight of production and inventory levels
8. Assisting sales team in activities and processes
9. Accounts Receivable Collections
10. Maintaining and updating sales data

settings.title: Website Assistant Developer / 網頁開發人員
settings.job_description:
*Near-fluent English speaker
*1+ years experience in web development
*Deep appreciation for, and understanding of good web design. You don't need to be a designer, but you should "get it."
*Expertise in HTML/CSS/JS/AJAX/Ruby/PHP
*Knowledge of Bootstrap framework
*Understanding of databases MySQL / Postgres
*Well versed in RWD techniques and mobile performance
*Comfortable with building front-end templates using JSON APIs
*Take pride in clean, readable code
*Understanding of best practices for SEO optimized website

Pluses
*Have Shopify/Liquid/Ruby development experience
*Desire to learn (curiosity)
*Passion for all things web
*Willingness to do things the right way (especially, late in the game when it's hard)
*Easy and enjoyable to work with
*Have high attention to detail
*Communicate well in writing

settings.title: Growth Marketing Specialist / 成長行銷
settings.job_description:
Responsibilities include:

- Ad Strategy: Identify ad networks (SEM, Social, and display ads) and implement a strategy that provides visibility in different areas of the funnel and customer journey.

- Build consumer acquisition and retention hypotheses, test them and iterate to optimize performance across the funnel (traffic, consideration, conversion, retention, revenue, and profitability) and channel (email, search engine, referral, etc)

- Develop and execute A/B tests with accurate analysis and reporting

- Analyze data on marketing campaign performance and return on investment per channel; report on your findings, identify opportunities for improvement, and systemize the learnings

- Use marketing automation tools and collaborate with product managers, content managers, UI/UX designers, and other resources you can get to maximize the conversion.

What Makes You Outstanding:

- Storytelling
- Branding and Positioning
- Funnels / Customer Journey
- Buyer Personas Analysis
- Content for Each Funnel Stage
- Strong Communication
- Strong Organization
- Content Curation
- Creativity
- Copywriting
- Research
- Excellent English writing skills
- Understanding of Brand Voice
- Data-Based Decision-Making
- Experience with Running Scientific Experiments
- Strong Presentation Skills

- Master's Degree in marketing, communications, digital marketing, or related
- 2-3 years of relevant work experience in digital marketing, e-commerce, preferably in a tech environment
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with multiple stakeholders
- Demonstrated ability to organize, prioritize, and multitask under tight deadlines
- Detail-oriented individual who takes initiative to define and improve processes
- Working knowledge of Hubspot, WordPress & Excel
- Experience with marketing reporting
- Native or near-native English skills

Must have:
- Understanding of Google Analytics / Tag Manager / Search Console
- Klaviyo, PostScript
- Google Sheets (excel)
- Facebook Business / Analytics / Ads Manager
- Audience Creation (Lookalikes, Geotargeting)
- Budgeting
- Reporting

settings.title: Backend Engineer 後端工程師
settings.job_description:
【主要工作內容】
1. 伺服器建置、佈署及維護
2. 資料庫設計與維護
3. RESTful API設計與維護

【徵求條件】
1. 熟悉PostgreSQL
2. 熟悉Ubuntu、Debian環境
3. 熟悉網路通訊協定，如Websocket、HTTP等
4. 熟悉Python、CherryPy
5. 熟悉AWS EC2、CodeCommit
6. 熟悉Git

settings.title: Full-time English Copywriter
settings.job_description:
·Objectives of this Role
- Thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with a high-volume workload often requiring short turnaround times
- Continually raise the bar on creativity, writing fresh copy that connects with the desired audience and drives action
- Comfortably vary voice, style, and other characteristics demanded by the industry, company, or target audience at hand
- Maintain up-to-date knowledge of communication and client-related industry trends
- Stay updated on appropriate style guidelines and brand voice for consistency in messaging


Daily and Monthly Responsibilities
- Interpret creative briefs to develop and produce creative concepts through execution on assigned brands
- Research and understand the client's needs and target audiences, through online searches, reviews of existing research, interviews with subject matter experts, and in-person meetings
- Write original copy and edit content for a range of corporate marketing and communications materials
- Collaborate with a team of account managers and creative staff from concept development to delivery of the final product
- Present copy concepts and final deliverables to the internal team, and to client representative as needed, and participate in client pitches on occasion
- Revise copy based on internal and client feedback/direction

settings.title: UI/UX Designer
settings.job_description:
Responsibilities
1. User Interface Design
2. User Experience Design
3. Make sure the finished product meets the design standards
4. Design proposal, case opening and closing
5. Data collection, analysis and report writing

6 The product includes website, software and equipment operation, etc.
7. Teamwork includes marketing, business, sales, engineering and customers

settings.title: Project Manager 專案經理
settings.job_description:
1. Monitoring of various operational projects including technical development, vendor and customer partnerships, and implementation of new system/processes
2. Optimizing our business operations based on internal data. You will identify operational weaknesses and help improve or innovate new processes
3. Collaborate with teams across product, engineer, and external partnerships to ensure that insights inform broader strategic initiatives
4. Develop a detailed project plan to track progress using a project management software
5. Perform risk management to minimize project risks and optimization methods
6. Establish and maintain relationships with third parties/vendors
7. Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation
8. Ensure that all projects are delivered on time, within the scope, and within budget
9. Developing project scopes and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility

settings.title: Accounting Intern 財務會計實習生
settings.job_description:
1. Answer the phone
2. ERP basic data maintenance
3. Customer order filing
4. FedEx shipment details check
5. Download the transaction details from the e-commerce
6. Other tasks assigned by supervisor

settings.title: Social Media Assistant
settings.job_description:
The social media assistant is responsible for brainstorming campaigns, creating social media posts, and analyzing analytics.

To be successful as a social media assistant, you must have excellent time management skills. A good social media assistant is eager to keep abreast of industry innovations and new software.
Responsibilities:
1. Brainstorm campaigns
2. Create social media posts
3. Use analytics tools to gauge the success of campaigns
4. Research industry innovations and tools
5. Update posts to include relevant keywords for search engine optimization
6. Prepare reports on campaigns based on analytics

settings.title: Test Engineer Assistant
settings.job_description:
Responsibilities

1. Ensuring the mixing and the filling of the resin bottles
2. Recording the resin production outcomes (storage, quality control)
3. Ensuring all tests and procedures meet company and industry standards.
4. Testing the printers and resins and preparing test reports for management.

Qualifications

*Technical background
*Be able to keep a clean and safe environment
*Autonomous
*Ability to troubleshoot and think out of the box.

settings.title: Customer Technical Support Agent
settings.job_description:
Responsibilities

1. Complete detailed reports listing requests for technical assistance, steps taken to resolve them, and the specific dates/individuals involved
2. Act as the initial point of contact for customers/users reaching via various channels such as social media, forums, etc with L1 requests for 3D Printers, cleaning and curing units, resins and software related concerns
3. Assist management in creating and planning training materials pertaining to all our products troubleshooting and usage
4. Organize and file documentation pertaining to warranties and instructional guides for 3D Printers and other related hardware
5. Maintain a working log detailing, nature of issues and best practices to resolve them
6. Attend meetings with clients to analyze, troubleshoot and diagnose hardware/software problems
7. Actively log and update management of potential issues that could cause an undesirable user experience

Qualifications

*A bachelor's degree in computer science, electrical engineer or related technology field is preferred
*1-2 years of relevant experience in a customer focused position involving technical knowledge of a company's products and services
*Professional written and interpersonal skills are essential when communicating with customers and clients
*Ability to prioritize and manage several milestones and projects efficiently
*Accept constructive criticism and customer feedback regarding their experience with 3D Printing software
*Comfortable working in and assisting others through company help desk software, with remote access desktop programs
*Time-management skills and the ability to establish reasonable and attainable deadlines for resolution
